body_html:
@benvcutilli I think not. Also, I am using volatile=True to prevent saving unnecessary intermediate results during evaluation.

Actually, for my case, experiments runs well for batches with batch size = 256. But it will break for the last batch in each epoch which has a size lower than 256, for example 143.
body_text:
@benvcutilli I think not. Also, I am using volatile=True to prevent saving unnecessary intermediate results during evaluation.
Actually, for my case, experiments runs well for batches with batch size = 256. But it will break for the last batch in each epoch which has a size lower than 256, for example 143.
body:
@benvcutilli I think not. Also, I am using ```volatile=True``` to prevent saving unnecessary intermediate results during evaluation.

Actually, for my case, experiments runs well for batches with batch size = 256. But it will break for the last batch in each epoch which has a size lower than 256, for example 143.
